title: Lock DGD

warning.currentPhaseLocking: You are now locking DGD in the **Locking Phase**.
warning.currentPhaseMain: You are now locking DGD in the **Main Phase**.
warning.unlock: Please note that once you locked, you can only unlock your DGDs in a **Locking Phase**.

instructions: Please enter the amount of DGD you wish to lock in:
stake: This will give you **{{stake}} STAKE** in DigixDAO.
txnSuccess: Your Lock DGD transaction is pending confirmation. See more
dgdApprovalSuccess: Your DGD Approval/Lock DGD transaction is pending confirmation. Please wait a while for it to be processed on the blockchain.
